properties.value: Vials are typically filled up with water and are most commonly used in the Herblore skill to make potions or mixes. Upon finishing a potion, the empty vial is left in the player's inventory; however with completion of Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl, players may speak to the Barbarian guard outside of the Barbarian Outpost to learn how to automatically smash vials upon finishing a potion (this can be used in F2P).

Item ID229

Vials are typically filled up with water and are most commonly used in the Herblore skill to make potions or mixes. Upon finishing a potion, the empty vial is left in the player's inventory; however with completion of Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl, players may speak to the Barbarian guard outside of the Barbarian Outpost to learn how to automatically smash vials upon finishing a potion (this can be used in F2P).
